  chunk_output_type: console

# Introduction

Ce poste rend compte de la surface des jardins partagés à Antibes Juan-les-Pins. Chaque rectangle est proportionnel à la surface en mètres carrés.

# Résultats

![](plots/plot_jardin_tree_m.jpg){fig-align="center"}

# Code

## Import



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(treemapify)
library(grid)

date_caption <- "27 septembre 2024"
source("tools/themes.R")

jardins <- read_csv("posts/2025-01-24/data/antibes-jardins-partages.csv")
glimpse(jardins)
```
:::



## Clean



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
jardins$site[jardins$site == 'Saint Maymes'] <- 
  c("Saint Maymes 1", "Saint Maymes 2") # give a number to each duplicate value
```
:::



## Analysis



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
jardins_tree <-
jardins %>% 
  summarize(site, surface_m2) 
jardins_tree
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 8 × 2
  site           surface_m2
  <chr>               <dbl>
1 Parc Estagnol         800
2 Saint Maymes 1       1100
3 Saint Maymes 2        500
4 Courbe                420
5 La Colle             1600
6 Rabiac/Carriat        455
7 Fontonne              613
8 Val Claret            591
```


:::
:::



## Plot



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot_jardin_tree <- 
jardins_tree %>%
  ggplot(aes(fill = site, area = surface_m2, label = paste0(site,sep = "\n", surface_m2, " m²"))) +
  geom_treemap(color = "#FAE5C6", size = 5,  alpha = 1) +
  geom_treemap_text(fontface = "bold", 
                    colour = "white", 
                    place = "center",
                    family = setfont,
                    grow = FALSE) + 
  scale_fill_manual(values = custom_palette_treemap) +
  theme(legend.position = "none")

plot_jardin_tree <-
plot_jardin_tree +
  labs(title = "Les jardins partagés à Antibes Juan-les-Pins",
       subtitle = "Surface des jardins partagés en m2",
       caption = social_caption3) + tt5
```
:::



## Render



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot_jardin_tree
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=768}
:::
:::



# Source

[Jardins partagés à Antibes Juan-les-Pins, disponible sur data.gouv.fr](https://www.data.gouv.fr/fr/datasets/jardins-partages-a-antibes-juan-les-pins/). Mise à jour du 27 septembre 2024
